verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid, [A Psalm] of David מַ֫שְׂכִּ֥יל <WH4905> mas-Kil Maschil אַשְׁרֵ֥י <WH835> 'ash-Rei Blessed נְֽשׂוּי־ <WH5375> ne-sui- [is] forgiven פֶּ֗שַׁע <WH6588> Pe-sha', [is he whose] transgression כְּס֣וּי <WH3680> ke-Sui [is] covered חֲטָאָֽה׃ <WH2401> cha-ta-'Ah. [whose] sin

אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי <WH835> 'Ash-rei Blessed אָדָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, [is] the man לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo does not יַחְשֹׁ֬ב <WH2803> yach-Sho imputeth יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto whom the LORD ל֣וֹ lo עָוֹ֑ן <WH5771> 'a-Von; not iniquity וְאֵ֖ין <WH369> ve-'Ein there בְּרוּח֣וֹ <WH7307> be-ru-Cho and in whose spirit רְמִיָּה׃ <WH7423> re-mi-yah [there is] no guile

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- When הֶ֭חֱרַשְׁתִּי <WH2790> He-che-rash-ti When I kept silence בָּל֣וּ <WH1086> ba-Lu waxed old עֲצָמָ֑י <WH6106> 'a-tza-Mai; my bones בְּ֝שַׁאֲגָתִ֗י <WH7581> be-sha-'a-ga-Ti, through my roaring כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> hai-Yom. all the day

כִּ֤י׀ <WH3588> ki For יוֹמָ֣ם <WH3119> yo-Mam For day וָלַיְלָה֮ <WH3915> va-lay-Lah and night תִּכְבַּ֥ד <WH3513> tich-Bad was heavy עָלַ֗י <WH5921> 'a-Lai, and יָ֫דֶ֥ךָ <WH3027> ya-De-cha thy hand נֶהְפַּ֥ךְ <WH2015> neh-Pach is turned לְשַׁדִּ֑י <WH3955> le-shad-Di; upon me my moisture בְּחַרְבֹ֖נֵי <WH2725> be-char-Vo-nei into the drought קַ֣יִץ <WH7019> Ka-yitz of summer סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

חַטָּאתִ֨י <WH2403> chat-ta-Ti my sin אוֹדִ֪יעֲךָ֡ <WH3045> o-Di-'a-cha I acknowledged וַעֲוֹ֘נִ֤י <WH5771> va-'a-Vo-Ni unto thee and mine iniquity לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- did not כִסִּ֗יתִי <WH3680> chis-Si-ti, have I not hid אָמַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> 'a-Mar-ti, I said אוֹדֶ֤ה <WH3034> o-Deh I will confess עֲלֵ֣י <WH5921> 'a-Lei and פְ֭שָׁעַי <WH6588> Fe-sha-'ai my transgressions לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; unto the LORD וְאַתָּ֨ה <WH859> ve-'at-Tah and You נָ֘שָׂ֤אתָ <WH5375> na-Sa-ta and thou forgavest עֲוֹ֖ן <WH5771> 'a-Von the iniquity חַטָּאתִ֣י <WH2403> chat-ta-Ti of my sin סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and זֹ֡את <WH2063> zot likewise יִתְפַּלֵּ֬ל <WH6419> yit-pal-Lel pray כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- everyone חָסִ֨יד׀ <WH2623> cha-Sid For this shall every one that is godly אֵלֶיךָ֮ <WH413> 'e-lei-Cha to you לְעֵ֪ת <WH6256> le-'Et unto thee in a time מְ֫צֹ֥א <WH4672> me-Tzo when thou mayest be found רַ֗ק <WH7535> Rak, in לְ֭שֵׁטֶף <WH7858> Le-she-tef surely in the floods מַ֣יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim waters רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> rab-Bim; of great אֵ֝לָ֗יו <WH413> 'e-Lav, about לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo they will not יַגִּֽיעוּ׃ <WH5060> yag-Gi-'u. they shall not come nigh

אַתָּ֤ה׀ <WH859> 'at-Tah You סֵ֥תֶר <WH5643> Se-ter Thou [art] my hiding place לִי֮ li מִצַּ֪ר <WH6862> mitz-Tzar me from trouble תִּ֫צְּרֵ֥נִי <WH5341> titz-tze-Re-ni thou shalt preserve רָנֵּ֥י <WH7438> ran-Nei me about with songs פַלֵּ֑ט <WH6405> fal-Let; of deliverance תְּס֖וֹבְבֵ֣נִי <WH5437> te-Sov-Ve-ni thou shalt compass סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

אַשְׂכִּֽילְךָ֨׀ <WH7919> 'as-ki-le-Cha I will instruct וְֽאוֹרְךָ֗ <WH3384> ve-'or-Cha, thee and teach בְּדֶֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> be-de-rech- thee in the way ז֥וּ <WH2098> zu which תֵלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> te-Lech; go אִֽיעֲצָ֖ה <WH3289> 'i-'a-Tzah I will guide עָלֶ֣יךָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha with עֵינִֽי׃ <WH5869> 'ei-Ni. thee with mine eye

אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay תִּֽהְי֤וּ׀ <WH1961> tih-Yu become כְּס֥וּס <WH5483> ke-Sus Be ye not as the horse כְּפֶרֶד֮ <WH6505> ke-fe-Red [or] as the mule אֵ֤ין <WH369> 'ein have הָ֫בִ֥ין <WH995> ha-Vin [which] have no understanding בְּמֶֽתֶג־ <WH4964> be-me-teg- in with bit וָרֶ֣סֶן <WH7448> va-Re-sen and bridle עֶדְי֣וֹ <WH5716> ed-Yo whose mouth לִבְל֑וֹם <WH1102> liv-Lom; must be held בַּ֝֗ל <WH1077> Bal, lest קְרֹ֣ב <WH7126> ke-Ro they come near אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha. about

רַבִּ֥ים <WH7227> rab-Bim Many מַכְאוֹבִ֗ים <WH4341> mach-'o-Vim, sorrows לָרָ֫שָׁ֥ע <WH7563> la-Ra-Sha' [shall be] to the wicked וְהַבּוֹטֵ֥חַ <WH982> ve-hab-bo-Te-ach but he that trusteth בַּיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; in the LORD חֶ֝֗סֶד <WH2617> Che-sed, mercy יְסוֹבְבֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH5437> ye-sov-Ven-nu. shall compass

שִׂמְח֬וּ <WH8055> sim-Chu Be glad בַֽיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh in the LORD וְ֭גִילוּ <WH1523> Ve-gi-lu and rejoice צַדִּיקִ֑ים <WH6662> tzad-di-Kim; ye righteous וְ֝הַרְנִ֗ינוּ <WH7442> ve-har-Ni-nu, and shout כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יִשְׁרֵי־ <WH3477> yish-rei- for joy all [ye that are] upright לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> Lev. in heart
